name: Isomedia
overview:
Isomedia is a full Service CD DVD Disc production facility. We provide complete turn-key project to our customers including CD DVD Disc production, Assembly and packaging. Our customers will get retail-ready CD or DVD in one stop. Isomedia serves broad client base such as Federal, State, Colleges, Private companies,Filmmakers and Musicians.

Isomedia’s production processs has two aspects catering to both small and large runs. In duplication process, we can make 100 to 500 pieces. In replication, we have state of art equipment to manufacture 1000 to 100,000 per order. For technical details of duplication and replication, please refer to our website for answers.

Isomedia is licensed and certified CD and DVD factory by industry leaders. Licensing and certification are the basic milestone for quality. We stand behind our product. Please refer to our website for our license and certification
